content.raw: What if we replace `GetOrCreate<T>(args...)` with a function `Insert<T>(args...)` that returns a `std::pair<T&, bool>` where the `T&` is a reference to either (1) the newly created data entry or (2) the already existing data entry which prevented an insertion. Then the `bool` would be true if a new data entry was inserted or false if an existing data entry blocked the insertion. This would better parallel the well-established `std::map::insert` function.
